verses.verse: Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, cause <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> her <S%H8441>abominations<s%>,

And <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; Your <S%H4351>birth<s%> and your <S%H4138>nativity<s%> is of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3669>Canaan<s%>; your <S%H1>father<s%> was a <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and your <S%H517>mother<s%> a <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>.

And as for your <S%H4138>nativity<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> you were <S%H3205>born<s%> your <S%H8270>navel<s%> was not <S%H3772>cut<s%>, neither were you <S%H7364>washed<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H4935>cleanse<s%> <S%H4414>you<s%>; you were not salted at <S%H4414>all<s%>, nor <S%H2853>swaddled<s%> at <S%H2853>all<s%>.

No <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>pitied<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, to do <S%H259>any<s%> of these unto <S%H2550>you<s%>, to have compassion upon <S%H7993>you<s%>; but you were cast out in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>, to the <S%H1604>loathing<s%> of your <S%H5315>person<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you were <S%H3205>born<s%>.

And when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by <S%H7200>you<s%>, and saw you <S%H947>covered<s%> in your own <S%H1818>blood<s%>, I <S%H559>said<s%> unto you when you were in your <S%H1818>blood<s%>, <S%H2421>Live<s%>; <S%H559>Yes<s%>, I said unto you when you were in your <S%H1818>blood<s%>, <S%H2421>Live<s%>.

I have <S%H5414>caused<s%> you to <S%H7233>multiply<s%> as the <S%H6780>bud<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and you have <S%H7235>increased<s%> and grown <S%H1431>great<s%>, and you have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5716>excellent<s%> <S%H5716>ornaments<s%>: your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> are <S%H3559>fashioned<s%>, and your <S%H8181>hair<s%> is <S%H6779>grown<s%>, where you were <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%>.

Now when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by <S%H7200>you<s%>, and looked upon <S%H6256>you<s%>, behold, your time was the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H1730>love<s%>; and I <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H3671>skirt<s%> over <S%H3680>you<s%>, and covered your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: <S%H7650>Yes<s%>, I swore unto <S%H935>you<s%>, and entered into a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H5002>you<s%>, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, and you became mine.
Then <S%H7364>washed<s%> I you with <S%H4325>water<s%>; <S%H7857>Yes<s%>, I throughly washed away your <S%H1818>blood<s%> from <S%H5480>you<s%>, and I anointed you with <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

I <S%H3847>clothed<s%> you also with embroidered <S%H7553>work<s%>, and <S%H5274>shod<s%> you with <S%H8476>badgers<s%>' skin, and I <S%H2280>dressed<s%> you in fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and I <S%H3680>covered<s%> you with <S%H4897>silk<s%>.
I <S%H5710>decked<s%> you also with <S%H5716>ornaments<s%>, and I <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> upon your <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and a <S%H7242>chain<s%> on your <S%H1627>neck<s%>.

And I <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5141>jewel<s%> on your <S%H639>forehead<s%>, and <S%H5694>earrings<s%> in your <S%H241>ears<s%>, and a <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H5850>crown<s%> upon your <S%H7218>head<s%>.

Thus were you <S%H5710>decked<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%>; and your <S%H4403>clothes<s%> were of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H4897>silk<s%>, and embroidered <S%H7553>work<s%>; you did <S%H398>eat<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%>: and you were <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3302>beautiful<s%>, and you did <S%H6743>prosper<s%> into a <S%H4410>kingdom<s%>.

And your <S%H8034>renown<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> for your <S%H3308>beauty<s%>: for it was <S%H3632>perfect<s%> through my <S%H1926>comeliness<s%>, which I had <S%H7760>put<s%> upon <S%H5002>you<s%>, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

But you did <S%H982>trust<s%> in your own <S%H3308>beauty<s%>, and played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> because of your <S%H8034>renown<s%>, and poured <S%H8210>out<s%> your <S%H8457>fornications<s%> on every one that passed <S%H5674>by<s%>; his it was.

And of your <S%H899>garments<s%> you did <S%H3947>take<s%>, and <S%H6213>decked<s%> your high <S%H1116>places<s%> with various <S%H2921>colors<s%>, and played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H935>thereupon<s%>: the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

You have also <S%H3947>taken<s%> your <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of my <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of my <S%H3701>silver<s%>, which I had <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, and made to yourself <S%H6754>images<s%> of <S%H2145>men<s%>, and did commit whoredom with <S%H2181>them<s%>,

And <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H5414>them<s%>: and you have set my <S%H8081>oil<s%> and my <S%H7004>incense<s%> before <S%H6440>them<s%>.

My <S%H3899>food<s%> also which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H5560>you<s%>, fine flour, and <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, with which I <S%H398>fed<s%> <S%H5414>you<s%>, you have even set it <S%H6440>before<s%> them for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%>: and thus it <S%H5002>was<s%>, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

Moreover you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, whom you have <S%H3205>borne<s%> unto <S%H2076>me<s%>, and these have you sacrificed unto them to be <S%H398>devoured<s%>. Is this of your <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> a small <S%H4592>matter<s%>,
That you have <S%H7819>slain<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them to cause them to pass through the fire for <S%H5674>them<s%>?

And in all your <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and your <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> you have not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth<s%>, when you were <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%>, and were <S%H947>polluted<s%> in your <S%H1818>blood<s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> all your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, <S%H188>(woe<s%>, <S%H188>woe<s%> unto you <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>;)
That you have also <S%H1129>built<s%> unto you an eminent <S%H1354>place<s%>, and have <S%H6213>made<s%> yourselves a high <S%H7413>place<s%> in every <S%H7339>street<s%>.

You have <S%H1129>built<s%> your high <S%H7413>place<s%> at every <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and have made your <S%H3308>beauty<s%> to be <S%H8581>abhorred<s%>, and have <S%H6589>opened<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> to every one that passed <S%H5674>by<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>.

You have also committed <S%H2181>fornication<s%> with the <S%H1121>Egyptians<s%> your <S%H7934>neighbors<s%>, <S%H1432>great<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; and have <S%H7235>increased<s%> your <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>, to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.

<S%H5186>Behold<s%>, therefore I have stretched out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> over <S%H1639>you<s%>, and have diminished your <S%H2706>ordinary<s%> <S%H5414>food<s%>, and delivered you unto the <S%H5315>will<s%> of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1323>you<s%>, the daughters of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, which are <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of your <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>.

You have played the <S%H2181>whore<s%> also with the <S%H1121>Assyrians<s%>, <S%H1115>because<s%> you were <S%H7646>insatiable<s%>; <S%H2181>Yes<s%>, you have played the prostitute with <S%H7654>them<s%>, and yet could not be satisfied.

You have moreover <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8457>fornication<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> unto <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%>; and yet you were not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> <S%H2063>herewith<s%>.

How <S%H535>weak<s%> is your <S%H3826>heart<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, seeing you <S%H6213>do<s%> all these <S%H4639>things<s%>, the work of a <S%H7986>imperious<s%> <S%H2181>whorish<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>;

In that you <S%H1129>build<s%> your eminent <S%H1354>place<s%> in the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> your high <S%H7413>place<s%> in every <S%H7339>street<s%>; and have not been as a <S%H2181>prostitute<s%>, in that you <S%H7046>scorn<s%> <S%H868>hire<s%>;
But as a <S%H802>wife<s%> that commits <S%H5003>adultery<s%>, which <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> instead of her <S%H376>husband<s%>!

They <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5078>gifts<s%> to all <S%H2181>whores<s%>: but you <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H5083>gifts<s%> to all your <S%H157>lovers<s%>, and <S%H7809>hire<s%> <S%H935>them<s%>, that they may come unto you on every <S%H5439>side<s%> for your <S%H8457>whoredom<s%>.

And you are <S%H2016>different<s%> from other <S%H802>women<s%> in your <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>, whereas none <S%H310>follows<s%> you to commit <S%H2181>whoredoms<s%>: and in that you <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H868>reward<s%>, and no <S%H868>reward<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H1961>you<s%>, in that you are <S%H2016>different<s%>.
<S%H2181>Therefore<s%>, O prostitute, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; Because your <S%H5178>filthiness<s%> was poured <S%H8210>out<s%>, and your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> <S%H1540>discovered<s%> through your <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> with your <S%H157>lovers<s%>, and with all the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of your <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, and by the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, which you did give unto <S%H5414>them<s%>;

<S%H6908>Behold<s%>, therefore I will gather all your <S%H157>lovers<s%>, with whom you have taken <S%H6149>pleasure<s%>, and all them that you have <S%H157>loved<s%>, with all them that you have <S%H8130>hated<s%>; I will even <S%H6908>gather<s%> them round <S%H5439>about<s%> against <S%H1540>you<s%>, and will uncover your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> unto <S%H7200>them<s%>, that they may see all your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.

And I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5003>you<s%>, as women that break wedlock and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> are <S%H4941>judged<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1818>blood<s%> in <S%H2534>fury<s%> and <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>.

And I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> you into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and they shall throw <S%H2040>down<s%> your eminent <S%H1354>place<s%>, and shall break <S%H5422>down<s%> your high <S%H7413>places<s%>: they shall <S%H6584>strip<s%> you also of your <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%>, and <S%H3240>leave<s%> you <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%>.

They shall also bring <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6951>company<s%> against <S%H7275>you<s%>, and they shall stone you with <S%H68>stones<s%>, and thrust you <S%H1333>through<s%> with their <S%H2719>swords<s%>.

And they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> your <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> upon you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>: and I will cause you to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from playing the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%>, and you also shall <S%H5414>give<s%> no hire any <S%H868>more<s%>.

So will I make my <S%H2534>fury<s%> toward you to <S%H5117>rest<s%>, and my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H8252>you<s%>, and I will be quiet, and will be no more <S%H3707>angry<s%>.

Because you have not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth<s%>, but have <S%H7264>fretted<s%> me in all these <S%H1887>things<s%>; behold, therefore I also will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> upon your <S%H7218>head<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>: and you shall not <S%H6213>commit<s%> this <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> above all your <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.
<S%H4911>Behold<s%>, every one that uses proverbs shall use this <S%H4911>proverb<s%> against <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, As is the <S%H517>mother<s%>, so is her <S%H1323>daughter<s%>.

You are your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, that <S%H1602>loathes<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> and her <S%H1121>sons<s%>; and you are the <S%H269>sister<s%> of your <S%H269>sisters<s%>, which <S%H1602>loathed<s%> their <S%H582>husbands<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons<s%>: your <S%H517>mother<s%> was a <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and your <S%H1>father<s%> an <S%H567>Amorite<s%>.

And your <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> is <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, she and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> that <S%H3427>live<s%> at your left <S%H8040>hand<s%>: and your <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwells<s%> at your right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, is <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

Yet have you not <S%H1980>walked<s%> after their <S%H1870>ways<s%>, nor <S%H6213>done<s%> after their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>: <S%H6985>but<s%>, as if that were a very <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7843>thing<s%>, you were corrupted more than <S%H2004>they<s%> in all your <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> your <S%H269>sister<s%> has not <S%H6213>done<s%>, she nor her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, as you have <S%H6213>done<s%>, you and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

<S%H5771>Behold<s%>, this was the iniquity of your <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, <S%H1347>pride<s%>, <S%H7653>fullness<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H7962>abundance<s%> of <S%H8252>idleness<s%> was in her and in her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, neither did she <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>.
And they were <S%H1361>haughty<s%>, and <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5493>me<s%>: therefore I took them away as I saw <S%H7200>good<s%>.

Neither has <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> <S%H2398>committed<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of your <S%H2403>sins<s%>; but you have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations<s%> more than <S%H2007>they<s%>, and have <S%H6663>justified<s%> your <S%H269>sisters<s%> in all your <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which you have <S%H6213>done<s%>.

You <S%H6419>also<s%>, which have judged your <S%H269>sisters<s%>, <S%H5375>bear<s%> your own <S%H3639>shame<s%> for your <S%H2403>sins<s%> that you have committed more <S%H8581>abominable<s%> than <S%H2004>they<s%>: they are more <S%H6663>righteous<s%> than <S%H954>you<s%>: Yes, be you confounded <S%H5375>also<s%>, and bear your <S%H3639>shame<s%>, in that you have <S%H6663>justified<s%> your <S%H269>sisters<s%>.

When I shall bring <S%H7725>again<s%> their <S%H7622>captivity<s%>, the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, then will I bring again the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of your <S%H7622>captives<s%> in the midst of <S%H8432>them<s%>:
That you may <S%H5375>bear<s%> your own <S%H3639>shame<s%>, and may be <S%H3637>confounded<s%> in all that you have <S%H6213>done<s%>, in that you are a comfort unto <S%H5162>them<s%>.

When your <S%H269>sisters<s%>, <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to their former <S%H6927>estate<s%>, and <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to their former <S%H6927>estate<s%>, then you and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to your former <S%H6927>estate<s%>.
For your <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> was not <S%H8052>mentioned<s%> by your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H1347>pride<s%>,

Before your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> was <S%H1540>discovered<s%>, as at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of your <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, and all that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H1323>her<s%>, the daughters of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, which <S%H7590>despise<s%> you round <S%H5439>about<s%>.
You have <S%H5375>borne<s%> your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; I will even <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you as you have <S%H6213>done<s%>, which have <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H423>oath<s%> in <S%H6565>breaking<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.
